title: Masonry: moulded work
brief_description: An ovolo moulding has been selected as an example. The working of this is demonstrated in detail, zinc template giving the section, cutting the main chamfer, fillets and further chamfers and the use of the boaster to finish the job. The method of working a return end is also shown.
